name: Kentucky Bourbon Onion Dip
author: McCormick Spice
summary: Bourbon-lovers rejoice--here's a dip you're going to flip for! Start by mixing your favorite bourbon, McCormick® Onion Gravy Mix and water in a bowl. Add melted butter and caramelized onions--plus sour cream and mayo for a creamy texture. It's sweet, tangy, and the perfect dipping partner for chicken fries or chips.
ingredients: 1 (.87 ounce) package McCormick® Onion Gravy Mix
1 ½ cups finely chopped red onions
directions: Mix water, bourbon and Gravy Mix in small bowl until well blended
Melt butter in large skillet on medium heat
Add onions; cook and stir 10 minutes or until softened and golden brown
Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes or until thickened
Mix sour cream and mayonnaise in medium bowl
Serve with chicken fries or chips
